constraints.name: range_min_assignment
constraints.description: 区间内所有元素可以被赋值为该区间的最小值
constraints.formal: ∀ l, r (1 ≤ l ≤ r ≤ n), h[i] = min(h[l], h[l+1], ..., h[r]) for all i in [l, r]

constraints.name: distinct_arrays_count
constraints.description: 计算通过若干次操作后不同的数组数量
constraints.formal: count(distinct(h')) where h' is the result of any number of range_min_assignment operations
